cause.description:
By supporting this just cause, you're helping to ensure the prevention, and elimination of sexaul abuse everywhere. By your generous donations contributed for this cause, all of which will be given to MaleSurvivor.com, your suporting an often unreported and unforgivable thing perpetrated upon many boys and men all over the world.
1. Most boys that are sexually abused and assaulted don't tell anyone of their trauma(s) until their middle-aged
2. More steps need to be taken to ensure the elmination of this infestation of evil in places around the world
3. To help stop, prevent, and get treatment for male survivors by providing funds from this cause to the MaleSurvivor Organization
cause.mission: create awareness of male sexual abuse and assault
cause.name: MaleSurvivor Awareness in Our Hands
